citation_details.title: Identifying site-and stimulation-specific TMS-evoked EEG potentials using a quantitative cosine similarity metric
citation_details.author: M Freedberg, JA Reeves, SJ Hussain, KA Zaghloul
citation_details.abstract: The ability to interpret transcranial magnetic stimulation (TMS)-evoked electroencephalography  (EEG) potentials (TEPs) is limited by artifacts, such as auditory evoked responses
citation_details.short_author: M Freedberg, JA Reeves, SJ Hussain, KA Zaghloul
